source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a log cabin with a green door and a picnic table in front of it, situated in a wooded area with fallen leaves on the ground. As the camera pans to the right, another log cabin with a similar design and green roof comes into view, along with a fire pit in the middle of the yard. The camera continues to move right, revealing more of the second cabin and the surrounding trees, with a paved path and additional picnic tables in the background.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a log cabin with a green door and a picnic table in front of it, situated in a wooded area with fallen leaves on the ground. As the camera pans to the right, another log cabin with a similar design and green roof comes into view, along with a fire pit in the middle of the yard. The camera continues to move right, revealing more of the second cabin and the surrounding trees, with a paved path and additional picnic tables in the background.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a person walks across the yard between the two cabins, which is not shown in the video.
